channel.title: Items and npc's on my server....and loading
channel.description:
You probably see by my name that i'm new. But when i spawn items or npcs on my server they aren't there? They show up as a yellow or red dot on the map but you can't see them on the screen..... :confused: Also when i walk over a loading point it freezes up?
PLZ ANSWER MY QUESTIONS!!!
im so confused.....
